Deploying Giotto¶

uWSGI¶

When creating the concrete controller file, make sure you include the --http option. Install uwsgi:

pip install uwsgi

and run the server by using the concrete controller file as the wsgi file:

uwsgi --http :5000 --wsgi-file giotto-http

gunicorn¶

Install gunicorn:

pip imnstall gunicorn

Gunicorn works slightly different that uwsgi. Some modifications of the automatically generated concrete controller is required.

Rename the giotto-http to http_gunicorn.py.

The run the following command:

gunicorn –workers=1 –log-level=debug giotto_gunicorn:application
